headline: NRG Energy Receives All Regulatory Approvals for LS Power Portfolio Acquisition
summary: HOUSTON, January 26, 2026--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NRG), today announced it has received antitrust clearance from the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) for its previously announced acquisition of 18 natural gas generation facilities and a commercial and industrial virtual power plant platform (C&I VPP) from LS Power.
